name: Ka𝐲le & Fi𝐞𝐧𝐝s
description:
In Kayle & Fiends you play as Kayle, a small spirit wielding the almighty power of Kale leafs to fight evil ghosts jealous of their abilities. They're able to fire a powerful laser destroying everything in its wake as well as channel the strength of his defeated foes to bind time itself to his will!

You can use either a mouse and a keyboard or a controller to play the game: (the bravest of players will try to use both at the same time)

Keyboard / Mouse: 

Z, Q, S, D OR W, A, S, D: Move Kayle around

Cursor: Aim Kayle's laser 

Left click: Fire the laser (Kale needed to reload)

Spacebare(hold): Slow down time

Escape: Pause the game

Controller: 

Left joystick: Move Kayle around

Right joystick: Aim Kayle's laser 

Right trigger: Fire the laser (Kale needed to reload)

Left trigger(hold): Slow down time

Start button: Pause the game

A game made by CHEDAL Dorian, JACOBSON Dimitri and DUBOIS-VERGIAT Iris during their first year at Institut de Création et d'Animation Numérique(ICAN) in Paris.
